verb.description: Transmit (a program or some information) by radio or television.
Scatter (seeds) by hand or machine rather than placing in drills or rows.

noun.description: A radio or television program or transmission.

adjective.description: Relating to radio or television transmission.

examples: green manure can be sown broadcast or in rows

origin: Mid 18th century (in the sense sown by scattering): from broad + the past participle of cast. Senses relating to radio and television date from the early 20th century.
